EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-87)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (x=41.0, y=-86.0) with chest at (x=40.5, y=-87.5)
- Burner mining drill (x=39.0, y=-85.0) with chest at (x=39.5, y=-83.5)
- Burner mining drill (x=37.0, y=-85.0) with chest at (x=36.5, y=-86.5)
- Burner inserters and wooden chests for coal distribution

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
- Stone furnace (x=-27.0, y=-58.0)
- Wooden chest (x=-27.5, y=-59.5) for ore storage
- Burner inserters for material movement

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (x=-10.0, y=-59.0), (x=-8.0, y=-59.0), (x=-6.0, y=-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters for ore collection
- Transport belt system for material movement

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- Four stone furnaces at positions (x=0.0, y=0.0), (x=2.0, y=0.0), (x=4.0, y=0.0), (x=6.0, y=0.0)
- Input wooden chests at y=-2.5
- Output wooden chests at y=2.5
- Burner inserters for material movement
- Transport belt system for output collection

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17-27)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (x=-3.5, y=27.5)
- Boiler (x=-1.5, y=22.0)
- Steam engine (x=4.5, y=20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electricity network with poles at (x=7.5,y=13.5), (x=10.5,y=12.5), (x=11.5,y=20.5), (x=7.5,y=20.5)

### Research Lab at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
- Connected to power network
- Ready for research operations

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities directly
- Cannot connect belts directly to furnaces - use inserters as intermediaries
- Always use appropriate connecting mechanisms (inserters) between different entity types

### Resource management issues
- Multiple mining drills are out of fuel - implement better fuel distribution system
- Some chests are full causing blockages - implement better material flow management
- Transport belts are blocked - ensure proper item clearance and flow

### Entity placement considerations
- Ensure proper spacing between entities to allow for inserter operation
- Consider input/output positions when placing connected entities

### Power network setup
- Ensure all electrical consumers are within range of power poles
- Maintain proper pole spacing for continuous power distribution
